column2: they may also move horizontally past each other and form transform boundary.

column1: Hindi Tansl: kaBI-kaBI ve eka-xUsare ke sAWa kREwija xiSA meM BI gawi kara sakawI hEM Ora rUpAMwara parisImA kA nirmANa karawI hEM.
Anu Translation:  kaBI kaBI ve eka xUsare pAsa se ho kara kREwija sWiwi meM cala sakawe hEM BI Ora sImA baxala_xe sakawI hE banAwA hE
